  • Constructor Details

    • Character

      Character(CharacterType characterType, int cost, Effect effect)
      Creates a Character object. The max number of students and blocks with this constructor is set to zero.
      Parameters:
      characterType - an identifier for the character.
      cost - the cost of the character.
      effect - the effect associated to this character.

    • Character

      Character(CharacterType characterType, int cost, Effect effect, int studentsLimit, int islandBlocks)
      Creates a Character object.
      Parameters:
      characterType - type of the character.
      cost - the character cost.
      effect - effect performed by the character on the game.
      studentsLimit - max. number of students which can be placed on the card.
      islandBlocks - number of island blocks available on this character. This will also be the maximum number of blocks that this Character can receive.

    • pickStudent

      public void pickStudent(Student student)
      Pick a student from the character card
      Parameters:
      student - student to be picked
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - if the character doesn't have students to pick or if the requested student is not available

    • canPickStudent

      public boolean canPickStudent(Student student)

    • getStudentsLimit

      public int getStudentsLimit()

    • pickBlock

      public void pickBlock()
      Pick a block card from the character card.
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - if the character doesn't have any block to pick.

    • canPickBlock

      public boolean canPickBlock()

    • receiveBlock

      public void receiveBlock()
      Place a block card on the character card
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - when the character cannot receive blocks or it has received too many blocks

    • performEffect

      public int performEffect(EffectArgs args, int coins)
      Perform the character effect. The first time the effect is called, one coin is taken by the character, and it will increment its cost.
      Parameters:
      args - parameters on which the card performs its effect.
      coins - the number of coins should be greater or equal to the cost of the character.
      Returns:
      the coins that are not used by the character.
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - if the effect cannot be performed or not enough coins are passed.
      IllegalArgumentException - if required parameters are null.

    • setEffect

      public void setEffect(Effect effect)
      This method must be used only to restore the effect after a deserialization.
      Parameters:
      effect - the effect to apply to this character.

    • receiveStudent

      public void receiveStudent(Student student)
      Place a student on the character card
      Specified by:
      receiveStudent in interface StudentReceiver
      Parameters:
      student - the student to receive
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - if no more students cannot be added

    • canReceiveStudent

      public boolean canReceiveStudent(Student student)
      Specified by:
      canReceiveStudent in interface StudentReceiver
      Parameters:
      student - the student to receive
      Returns:
      true if the student can be received, false otherwise

    • canReceiveStudents

      Specified by:
      canReceiveStudents in interface StudentReceiver
      Parameters:
      students - the students to receive
      Returns:
      true if the students can be received, false otherwise
